languages.text: "Весь этот суд — фарс! Это меньше всего похоже на правосудие, чье имя носит Дворец!"
"This entire court is a farce! They call this the Palace of Justice, but what goes on here is anything but!"
languages.original_text: "Весь этот суд — фарс! Это меньше всего похоже на правосудие, чье имя носит Дворец!"

traits.locale_text: "This entire court is a farce! The place is called the Palace of Justice, but what goes on here is anything but!"
"This entire court is a farce! The place is called the Palace of Justice, but what goes on here is anything but!"
"This entire court is a farce! They call this the Palace of Justice, but what goes on here is anything but!"
"This entire court is a farce! They call this the Palace of Justice, but what goes on here is anything but!"
"This entire court is a farce! They call this the Palace of Justice, but what goes on here is anything but!"
"This entire court is a farce! They call this the Palace of Justice, but what goes on here is anything but!"

languages.text: "Dieses ganze Gericht ist ein Farce! Sie bezeichnen das hier als Justizpalast, aber was hier vorgeht, ist alles andere als das."
languages.original_text: "This entire court is a farce! They call this the Palace of Justice, but what goes on here is anything but!"

traits.locale_text: "Dieses ganze Gericht ist ein Farce! Sie bezeichnen das hier als Justizpalast, aber was hier vorgeht, ist alles andere als das."

languages.text: « Ces procès ne sont qu'une mascarade ! Ce qui se passe dans ce prétendu palais de "justice" n'a rien de juste ! »
languages.original_text: "This entire court is a farce! They call this the Palace of Justice, but what goes on here is anything but!"

traits.locale_text: « Ces procès ne sont qu'une mascarade ! Ce qui se passe dans ce prétendu palais de "justice" n'a rien de juste ! »

languages.text: “这场审判简直是场闹剧！这里明明叫做正义大殿，可这里发生的一切，和正义一点关系都没有！”
languages.original_text: "This entire court is a farce! They call this the Palace of Justice, but what goes on here is anything but!"

traits.locale_text: “这场审判简直是场闹剧！这里明明叫做正义大殿，可这里发生的一切，和正义一点关系都没有！”

languages.text: «¡Este tribunal es una farsa! Llaman a esto el Palacio de la Justicia, ¡pero aquí no hay justicia alguna!».
languages.original_text: "This entire court is a farce! They call this the Palace of Justice, but what goes on here is anything but!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Este tribunal es una farsa! Llaman a esto el Palacio de la Justicia, ¡pero aquí no hay justicia alguna!».

languages.text: 「この法廷全体が茶番だ！ここは司法宮と呼ばれているが、ここで行われていることはそれ以外の何物でもない！」
languages.original_text: "This entire court is a farce! They call this the Palace of Justice, but what goes on here is anything but!"

traits.locale_text: 「この法廷全体が茶番だ！ここは司法宮と呼ばれているが、ここで行われていることはそれ以外の何物でもない！」

languages.text: "Bu mahkeme tam bir maskaralık! Buraya Adalet Sarayı diyorlar ama burada olup bitenlerin adaletle uzaktan yakından alakası yok!"
languages.original_text: "This entire court is a farce! They call this the Palace of Justice, but what goes on here is anything but!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu mahkeme tam bir maskaralık! Buraya Adalet Sarayı diyorlar ama burada olup bitenlerin adaletle uzaktan yakından alakası yok!"
